summary.span: 表示 的自定义视图。

span.span: Represents a customized view of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只要显示数据（如 控件中），就只能显示每行的一个版本。Whenever data is displayed, such as in a control, only one version of each row can be displayed. 显示的行是 。The displayed row is a . 可以有四种不同版本状态之一： `Default`、`Original`、`Current`和 `Proposed`。A can have one of four different version states: `Default`, `Original`, `Current`, and `Proposed`. 对 调用 之后，任何已编辑的值都将成为 `Proposed` 值。After invoking on a , any edited value becomes the `Proposed` value. 在调用 或 之前，该行具有 `Original` 和 `Proposed` 版本。Until either or is invoked, the row has an `Original` and a `Proposed` version. 如果调用 ，则将放弃建议的版本，并且值将恢复为 `Original`。If is invoked, the proposed version is discarded, and the value reverts to `Original`. 如果调用了 ，则 不再具有 `Proposed` 版本;而建议的值将变为当前值。If is invoked, the no longer has a `Proposed` version; instead, the proposed value becomes the current value. 默认值仅适用于具有定义了默认值的列的行。Default values are available only on rows that have columns with default values defined. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性来确定 中的行的状态。The following example uses the property to determine the state of a row in the . （有关其他示例，请参阅使用 。）(See for another example using .) [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataRowView.RowVersion1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataRowView.RowVersion1/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataRowView.RowVersion1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataRowView.RowVersion1/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 对于多线程读取操作，此类型是安全的。

span.span: This type is safe for multithreaded read operations.

threadsafe.span: 必须同步任何写入操作。

span.span: You must synchronize any write operations.

summary.span: 开始编辑过程。

span.span: Begins an edit procedure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 添加 。Use to add a . 方法与 的 方法相同。The method is identical to the method of the . 调用 后，对 所做的任何更改都可以通过调用 回滚。After calling , any changes made to the can be rolled back by calling . 调用 方法，使用户能够更改行值。Call the method before allowing users to change row values. 更改值后，您可以通过将 设置为 `DataRowVersion.Proposed`来检索新的值。After values have been changed, you retrieve the new values by setting the to `DataRowVersion.Proposed`. 使用业务规则检查值，并根据需要通过调用 来回滚更改，或调用 以接受更改。Check the values with a business rule, and roll back the changes if needed by calling , or call to accept the changes. ## Examples 下面的示例在 中编辑行。The following example edits a row in a . 调用 ，然后 。calling the before, and afterwards. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRowView.BeginEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowView.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRowView.BeginEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRowView.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取消编辑过程。

span.span: Cancels an edit procedure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 后，对该行进行的所有更改都将回滚。After calling , all changes to the row are rolled back. 还可以通过对父 调用 来回滚更改。You can also roll back changes by calling on the parent . ## Examples 下面的示例在 中编辑行。The following example edits a row in a . 如果验证失败，则调用 方法取消更改。The method is called to cancel the changes if the validation fails.
